response.overview: In 1971, military dictatorship in Brazil reaches its height. The Paiva family — Rubens, Eunice, and their five children — live in a beachside house in Rio, open to all their friends. One day, Rubens is taken for questioning and does not return.
response.tagline: When a mother's courage defies tyranny, hope is reborn.
response.title: I'm Still Here

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
New York City, NY / Los Angeles, CA
